ComicInfo.Summary:
If it's true that only fools fall in love, does that mean it couldn't happen to an angel? Even as this strange scenario unfolds for Gabriel, Constantine and Kit attempt to evade a mob of murderous racists. "Fear and Loathing" Part 2.
